about_the_game:
This game is a horror puzzle game in which a man goes to the village where his parents lived.

Playtime is 15-30 minutes and there are two endings.

Explore the village

You can't contact your parents. Go to the village where your parents live and find out what happened in the town.

Long ago, from the point when you left the town, the village started to have an evil aura. Now the village is quiet as if no one lives there. Find the people who disappeared and the memories you forgot.

Choose your path

Villagers have been holding rituals since ancient times. But their rituals were not common. You will be confronted with the lives that were sacrificed.

Will you join your parents in believing in the pseudo-religion? Or will you take the side of the lives that were sacrificed?

Follow the trail

Religious items used by your parents remain in the house. There are also hidden traces of someone other than your parents. You must interpret the messages left by that person and follow the path she leads you. Check every nook and cranny of the house to make sure there is no evidence you have missed.

short_description: SAIBI is a first-person indie horror game that covers the tragic content caused by the pseudo-religion in a certain village. You must unlock the puzzles that someone in the village made for you and get the truth.
